sentence.Network_cn: 他有时也会大胆坚持不受欢迎、但却有原则性的立场。

sentence.Network_en: You have to take a principled stand.
She was a strong, principled woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 她是一个坚强而有原则的女人。

entry.tran: 原则性强的；坚持操守的
entry.def: If you describe someone as principled, you approve of them because they have strong moral principles.

example.ex: She was a strong, principled woman...
example.tran: 她是一个坚强而有原则的女人。

example.ex: You have to take a principled stand.

means.word_mean: 1. based on or manifesting objectively defined standards of rightness or morality;

auth_sentence.content: This system was set up to promote principled compromise.
auth_sentence.res_content: This system was set up to promote principled compromise.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This system was set up to promote principled compromise.

auth_sentence.content: Yet I find no principled reason to deny it.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet I find no principled reason to deny it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet I find no principled reason to deny it.

auth_sentence.content: But either "principled" position leads to monstrous results.
auth_sentence.res_content: But either "principled" position leads to monstrous results.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But either "principled" position leads to monstrous results.
